NK010(tha)037:0: phur ba'i sgo nas mthu bzlog rdo zor gyi lag
NK010(tha)037:1: len gsal por bkod pa gnam lcags thog zer bzhugs
NK010(tha)037:2: so // na mo gu ru kro d+ha ra dz+aa ya /
NK010(tha)037:3: 'dir thabs zhags kyi rgyud las rig sngags gcod pa'i man ngag gsungs pa dang /
NK010(tha)037:4: gu ru rat+na gling pa'i gter kha las rdo zor
NK010(tha)037:5: gyi sngags tshan gnyis byung ba dgongs pa bsdeb te
NK010(tha)037:6: 'god pa la lha dang mkha' 'gros gnang ba stsal
NK010(tha)037:7: du gsol / de yang rdo rje phur pa'i cho ga'i gzhung bsrangs la //
NK010(tha)037:8: las sbyor rdo zor bsgrub bar bya ste //
NK010(tha)037:9: phyar nag gam phub bam sla nga'i nang du //
NK010(tha)037:10: brag rgod kyi rdo dmar po'am nag po zur gsum che ba dbus su bzhag /
NK010(tha)037:11: gzhan brag nag chu 'gram rdo nag du mas mtha' bskor te bzhag /
NK010(tha)037:12: mtshal dang dug khrag sbyar bas rdo rnams la /
NK010(tha)037:13: gu ru ha ri ni sa da pa sha srog
NK010(tha)037:14: du rdo pa sha srog du ni pa sha srog
NK010(tha)037:17: n+aa ga khams gsum bcas bzhi po'i mgo la sbyar 'dug /
NK010(tha)037:18: 'di khang sel zhing sel gyi sngags su 'dug /
NK010(tha)037:21: gum pa sha srog du zhes pa las rgyud na 'dug /
NK010(tha)037:22: n+aa ga khams gsum sbur shigs kyang /
NK010(tha)037:23: ya bzlog bzlog b+h+yo b+h+yoh zhes bris /
NK010(tha)037:24: gal te rdo rang la bri ma bde na dug shog la bris te sbyar /
NK010(tha)037:25: gzhan yang khrag gis rdo rnams la b+h+yo b+h+yo bzlog
NK010(tha)037:26: bzlog gang shong bris rdo zor rnams bal tshon gyi
NK010(tha)037:28: rus pa dang khrag gis brgyan la bzhag go //
NK010(tha)037:29: phur pa'i bsnyen pa spu gri'i sngags bcas ci rigs bzlas pa'i rjes su /
NK010(tha)037:31: khog pa kha phye ba las pags pa sa gzhir gyur pa'i steng du de'i /
NK010(tha)037:32: ru dra'i keng rus las grub pa'i ri rab chen
NK010(tha)037:33: po mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba'i nags tshal 'khrigs
NK010(tha)037:34: pa / dug rlangs me ri dmar nag du 'bar ba /
NK010(tha)037:35: mthong ba tsam gyis 'jigs shing ya nga ba'i rang bzhin can /
NK010(tha)037:36: khrag gi rgya mtsho chen po'i rba rlabs drag tu
NK010(tha)037:37: 'khrugs pa'i dbus nas thol gyis skyes pa de la
NK010(tha)037:38: / ye shes dang 'jig rten pa'i dregs byed thams
NK010(tha)037:39: cad kyi mthu dang nus pa 'jig rten khams kyi
NK010(tha)037:40: nad mtshon dug sogs drag po'i rdzas kyi nus pa
NK010(tha)037:41: thams cad bsdus nas thim par bsam la /
NK010(tha)037:42: rdo zor sgrub pa'i sngags 'di bdun sogs brjod do //
NK010(tha)037:43: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya dip+ta tsakra ha na ha na ru lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u /
NK010(tha)037:44: h'u ha he phata b+h+yo ram /
NK010(tha)037:45: n+aa ga thum thum m+aa ra ya dug thum ril b+h+yo /
NK010(tha)037:47: skabs 'dir tshogs kyi mchod bshags skong ba bsgral stob bcas song nas /
NK010(tha)037:50: sha khrag dang ling ga la dmigs te 'gugs gzhug drag po byas nas /
NK010(tha)037:51: e a ra li ho hrim hrim hrimh zhes brjod
NK010(tha)037:52: pas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i khro bo thams cad
NK010(tha)037:55: lha mo blo ldan tshogs kyi bdag /
NK010(tha)037:56: he ru dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK010(tha)037:57: slob dpon la ni brnyas byed dang //
NK010(tha)037:58: rnal 'byor bar du gcod pa dang //
NK010(tha)037:59: dam tshig gnyan po 'dral ba dang //
NK010(tha)037:60: rdo rje'i spun la 'khu ba dang //
NK010(tha)037:61: bdag la bsam ngan sbyor rtsub byed //
NK010(tha)037:62: byad kha rbod gtong byed pa rnams //
NK010(tha)037:63: khyed kyis rdul du brlag nas ni //
NK010(tha)037:64: gnod sems ma lus gtan nas phyungs //
NK010(tha)037:65: zhes byas la dgra bo rig sngags dang bcas pa bkug pa'i gzugs la /
NK010(tha)037:67: k+ai la ya 'bru bco brgyad pa spu gri tshar gcig gis bsgral /
NK010(tha)037:68: dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang rdzas kyi phur pa dang
NK010(tha)037:69: rdo yi zor de las drag po mtshon cha'i char
NK010(tha)037:71: dgra bgegs byad ma'i phung po rig sngags kyi nus
NK010(tha)037:72: pa dang bcas pa tshal pa dum bur gtub par
NK010(tha)037:73: bsam la / thabs zhags las gsungs pa'i rig sngags
NK010(tha)037:74: gcod pa'i drag sngags khyad par can bzlas pa tsam
NK010(tha)037:75: gyis dregs pa can thams cad brgyal zhing gcod par
NK010(tha)037:76: byed pa 'di ci nus bzlas la ling+ga dum bur
NK010(tha)037:77: bsam la / gtub bo // badz+ra dz+wa la badz+ra h'u /
NK010(tha)037:78: man+t+ra sum+b+ha ni badz+ra dz+wa la h'u /
NK010(tha)037:79: b+h+r+aum h'u b+h+r+aum t+r+aam b+h+r+aum h+r+aihb+h+r+aum +aahb+h+r+aumh de nas /
NK010(tha)037:80: dgra bgegs byad ma bsgral ba'i sha ri khrag mtsho
NK010(tha)037:81: rus pa'i gram khrod chen po kha dog dri ro
NK010(tha)037:82: nus pa phun sum tshogs par bsam la /
NK010(tha)037:85: dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i sha yi ri bo khrag gi
NK010(tha)037:86: rgya mtsho rus pa'i gram khrod chen po stong gsum
NK010(tha)037:87: dang mnyam pa la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang
NK010(tha)037:88: khro bo khro mo ma mo mkha' 'gro phra men
NK010(tha)037:89: las byed lha srin sde brgyad thams cad kyis gad
NK010(tha)037:90: brgyangs di ri ri gsol zhing rnal 'byor ba bdag
NK010(tha)037:91: gi bgo ba'i bka' la nyan nas dgra bgegs bzlog
NK010(tha)037:92: bsad kyi las la rngams pas drag po'i phrin las
NK010(tha)037:94: rtsa sngags la gtor sngags btags pa lan gsum mam bdun gyis mchod /
NK010(tha)037:95: 'byung po'i sha ni shin tu zhim //
NK010(tha)037:96: 'byung po'i khrag ni shin tu zhim //
NK010(tha)037:97: 'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa ste //
NK010(tha)037:98: gsol te thams cad dgyes par mdzod //
NK010(tha)037:99: badz+ra push+pe sogs nyer spyod dang /
NK010(tha)037:100: ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kh+aa his bdud rtsi /
NK010(tha)037:101: ma h+aa rak+ta kh+aa his khrag mchog /
NK010(tha)037:102: bskal pa me ltar mas bstod /
NK010(tha)037:103: e ma'o chos kyi don 'byung ba //
NK010(tha)037:104: chos don dag pa bdag med pa //
NK010(tha)037:105: nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas //
NK010(tha)037:106: rdo rje rgyal por phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK010(tha)037:107: ces byas la rol mo dang bcas thun gtor gzhung ltar 'a bul /
NK010(tha)037:108: de nas phur pa'i lha rgyud bskul ba /
NK010(tha)037:110: shin tu mi bzad dpal chen sogs /
NK010(tha)037:111: dbus phyogs gtso bo yab yum phra men bcas //
NK010(tha)037:112: dgra bgegs sha khrag mchod pa 'di bzhes nas //
NK010(tha)037:113: rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la //
NK010(tha)037:114: pha rol mi dang mi min bsam ngan gyis //
NK010(tha)037:115: rig sngags rbod gtong mthu gtad ngan sbyor sogs //
NK010(tha)037:116: mi mthun 'gal rkyen gnod pa'i phyogs rnams kun //
NK010(tha)037:117: bzlog cing bsgyur ba'i phrin las dus la bab //
NK010(tha)037:118: dam nyams byad ma rang gshed rang la phob //
NK010(tha)037:119: dgra bgegs byad ma sod cig m+aa ra ya //
NK010(tha)037:120: zhes btags pa khro bcu sgo ma phur srung bcas
NK010(tha)037:121: kyi bar du de ltar sbyar zhing ling ro zor
NK010(tha)037:123: dal gyi lha rnams kyi zhal phyir gzigs nas bzlog sngags 'brug stong ltar bsgrags shing /
NK010(tha)037:124: khro tshogs me mtshon drag po'i thog char 'phros pas
NK010(tha)037:125: bdag 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'gal rkyen gnod pa bar
NK010(tha)037:126: chad ci yod pa thams cad sbur ma rlung gis
NK010(tha)037:127: khyer ba ltar phyir ded pa dang bcas te khro
NK010(tha)037:128: bo dang dregs pa'i dmag de dag dgra bgegs byad
NK010(tha)037:129: ma'i steng du phab pas srung ba'i gur bcom nas
NK010(tha)037:130: sde dang ris su gtogs pa thams cad thal ba
NK010(tha)037:131: rdul du brlag ste rjes shul med par byas par
NK010(tha)037:132: bsam la / phreng ba phyir bsgyur te /
NK010(tha)037:133: gu ru ha ri ni sad pa sha sogs gong
NK010(tha)037:134: gi sngags de bdun dang nyer gcig brgya sogs skabs
NK010(tha)037:135: bstun dang / drag sngags gnam lcags thog gi spu
NK010(tha)037:136: gri bzlog pa thub chod zab mo 'di ci nus
NK010(tha)037:138: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya h'u h'u h'u /
NK010(tha)037:139: bdud pra m+aa ra ya rbad nan /
NK010(tha)037:140: kha la dza ma li rbad nan r+aa dza dun
NK010(tha)037:141: ling shag rbad nan shig shig rbad nan dum dum
NK010(tha)037:142: rbad nan tshal pa tshal pa rbad nan khrmo khrmo
NK010(tha)037:143: b+h+yo rbad nanah rmug rmug rbad nan tir tir rbad
NK010(tha)037:144: nan tshal tshal rbad nan zhes so //
NK010(tha)037:145: sngags 'dis phyi nang sde brgyad rbad 'dre rbad gtong kun dang /
NK010(tha)037:146: tha na gcan gzan dang sbrang bu yan chad kyi
NK010(tha)037:147: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad kha 'ching zhing bzlog
NK010(tha)037:148: par byed do // rang la gzhan gyi rbod gtong sogs tshabs che na /
NK010(tha)037:149: nyi nag dang khyab 'jug rgyu dus sogs dus rtsub mo byung ba la bzla zhing /
NK010(tha)037:150: thog ser 'bab pa sogs nyam nga dang nyer 'tshe
NK010(tha)037:151: byung dus bya yi shin tu gnyan pas gar thod
NK010(tha)037:152: thod mi bya zhes gsungs so //
NK010(tha)037:153: sngags bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis rdo zor la brabs par bya'o //
NK010(tha)037:154: mthar bden stobs brjod la thal mo gdab /
NK010(tha)037:155: ka dam pa'i phur nag gi bzlog byang sogs bzlog byang ci rigs bton kyang legs so //
NK010(tha)037:156: de nas gsol kha sogs dkyus ltar bya /
NK010(tha)037:157: de ltar zhag gcig gam gsum sogs skabs dang bstun te bsgrubs pa'i mthar /
NK010(tha)037:158: gser skyems sgo dbye dang zor 'phen pa'i tshig rgyas bsdus gang 'os rjes /
NK010(tha)037:159: rang rdo rje gzhon nur gsal ba'i phyag g.yas na /
NK010(tha)037:160: gdug pa'i rdo zor chen po nad mtshon dug gi
NK010(tha)037:161: me dpung dmar nag tu 'bar ba de nyid dgra
NK010(tha)037:162: bgegs byad ma gang du gnas pa'i steng du gnam
NK010(tha)037:163: lcags kyi thog bab pa ltar brgyab pas srung gur
NK010(tha)037:164: lus srog yul khams dang bcas pa /
NK010(tha)037:165: sgo nga brag gis bcar ba ltar brlag nas rim
NK010(tha)037:166: par 'og gzhi'i 'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil 'khor dang
NK010(tha)037:167: bsres te rnam par shes pa drag po'i nam mkha'
NK010(tha)037:168: mthing nag e dbyings mu med mtha' bral chos nyid
NK010(tha)037:169: chos sku'i klong du thim nas gnod pa'i bsam sbyor
NK010(tha)037:170: nam yang mi skye bar 'khrul snang rgyun chad de
NK010(tha)037:172: rdo zor lag tu thogs nas 'phen stangs bcas /
NK010(tha)037:173: rdo zor sngags da pa sha can tshar gsum /
NK010(tha)037:174: thub chod spu gri tshar bdun tsam bzla zhing /
NK010(tha)037:175: yang yang dmigs pa gsal nges lan gsum bskyar la /
NK010(tha)037:176: phyogs ba zhi'am gang gnod phyogs su /
NK010(tha)037:177: dgu stong sogs la lag pa'am 'ur rdos 'phang /
NK010(tha)037:178: 'di dang mnyam du gtor bzlog gzhan grub na'ang legs
NK010(tha)037:179: ste zor rnams khyim mam grong gi mtha' bskor te
NK010(tha)037:181: bden brdar dmod bcol bya zhing g.yab mo brdab /
NK010(tha)037:182: des ban bon stong gis brubs kyang nub gcig gis
NK010(tha)037:183: 'joms zhing rang gshed 'beb par byed pa dang lha
NK010(tha)037:184: srin sde brgyad kyi gnod pa thams cad hur thum
NK010(tha)037:185: du bzlog pa zab pa'i mthar thug go //
NK010(tha)037:187: gsang rgyah tshul 'dis pha rol gyi rig sngags gcod pa'i las mtha' sbyin bsreg bya na /
NK010(tha)037:188: skud pa nag pos bcings pa'i r+ts+wa gzugs kyi ling+ga'i khong par /
NK010(tha)037:189: n+ri dang tri la pha rol byad ma che ge
NK010(tha)037:190: mo rigs sngags kyi nus pa dang bcas pa khug
NK010(tha)037:191: cig / dzahmh'u bam hoh zhes bris pa'i shog byang gzhug /
NK010(tha)037:192: pha rol gyi zag rdzas byugs na myur /
NK010(tha)037:194: 'di bcas nas rdo zor gyi gam du bzhag ste
NK010(tha)037:195: byad ma'i rnam shes de la bstim pa zhal shes
NK010(tha)037:196: so // de nas bdag dpal chen po yang phur gang rung sogs su gsal la /
NK010(tha)037:197: 'khor ko seng dang bka' nyan gyi tshogs khro bo bcu sogs kyis bskor bar gsal /
NK010(tha)037:198: gong ltar e +aa ra li sogs kyi khro tshogs
NK010(tha)037:199: spyan drangs pa dang bskul te pho nya btang bas
NK010(tha)037:200: byad ma dang / rig sngags thams cad bkug ste dmigs rten de la bstim /
NK010(tha)037:201: gong ltar phur bus gdab cing /
NK010(tha)037:202: rig sngags gcod pa'i sngags bzla bzhin mtshon chas gtubs nas /
NK010(tha)037:203: dug can dang tsher ma can gyi shing gi hom
NK010(tha)037:204: du me sbar la ram las drag po'i me lha'i
NK010(tha)037:205: lto bar dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad skad cig
NK010(tha)037:206: gis bskyed la / dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i sha ri sogs gong ltar /
NK010(tha)037:210: 'byung po'i sha ni sogs nyer spyod sman rag bcas pas mchod cing /
NK010(tha)037:211: tsha rtsub gnag pa'i shing dang ling ro sha khrag chang dang sbyar ba bsregs la /
NK010(tha)037:213: gnod byed dgra bgegs byad ma rig sngags dang bcas
NK010(tha)037:214: pa kha kha kh+aa hi kh+aa hi ag+ne dz+wa la
NK010(tha)037:216: spro na lha rgyud kyi bskul ba'i rjes su /
NK010(tha)037:217: bstab pa'i 'phyong tshig bcas lha re re bcas 'bul lo //
NK010(tha)037:218: lha rnams kyi ha ha'i sgra dang bcas te lhag med gsol bar bsam /
NK010(tha)037:220: bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yi sogs kyis bstod
NK010(tha)037:221: pa'i rdo rje'i glu dang gar gyis mnyes par byas
NK010(tha)037:222: nas mi dmigs par bsam la dge ba bsngo zhing
NK010(tha)037:223: shis brjod bya'o // gal te mnan pa byed na
NK010(tha)037:224: sreg pa'i thal ba cha gcig zor dang mnyam du
NK010(tha)037:225: shis brjod bya'o // rlung la bskur / cha gcig
NK010(tha)037:226: gam cha shas las brnag pa'i ru pa srog yig
NK010(tha)037:228: de la byad ma dang de'i rigs sngags kyi nus
NK010(tha)037:229: pa thams cad bkug nas bstim pa nan tan byas
NK010(tha)037:230: la / sgo them gyi 'og dong gru gsum nang
NK010(tha)037:231: mgo mjug bzlog ste 'phang ba 'byung bzhi'i rngams 'og
NK010(tha)037:232: thar med e khang du tshud de snying steng ri
NK010(tha)037:233: rab lta bu'i phur pa'i gzer theb /
NK010(tha)037:234: slar de steng 'byung ba rim brtsegs steng lha'i pho
NK010(tha)037:235: brang bcos pas nam yang ldang ba med par bsam
NK010(tha)037:236: la / rtsa sngags la dgra bgegs byad ma rig sngags kyi nus pa dang bcas pa /
NK010(tha)037:237: trig nan e hur thum m+aa ra ya rbad /
NK010(tha)037:238: s+t+aam+b+ha ya nan mnan sngags gzhan yang bzlas chog /
NK010(tha)037:240: tshul de dag gis pha rol byad ma'i rigs sngags
NK010(tha)037:241: rbod gtong thams cad gtan brlag tu byed par gdon
NK010(tha)037:242: mi za bas gsang te snying la 'chang bar bya'o
NK010(tha)037:243: // e ma snga 'gyur gdams pa ngo mtshar che //
NK010(tha)037:244: 'di la brten nas phyogs kyi byad ma'i dpung //
NK010(tha)037:245: ches mang nags tshal me yis 'joms ltar btang //
NK010(tha)037:246: chu stag dgun phyogs chos 'di nyi ltar gsal //
NK010(tha)037:247: 'don cha mang ba tsam zhig gtso bo min //
NK010(tha)037:248: sngags dmigs lag len zab pa mchog tu basngagasa //
NK010(tha)037:249: 'di bzhin nyams su longs dang phas rgol gyi //
NK010(tha)037:250: g.yul las rnam rgyal snyan grags 'brug sgra sgrogs /
NK010(tha)037:252: zhes pa'ang mi pham 'jam dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i
NK010(tha)037:253: rang nyid la dgos pa'i don du bsdeb cing lag
NK010(tha)037:254: tu blang pas yid ches ngo mtshar gyi 'bras bu
NK010(tha)037:255: mthong ba shin tu zab cing gsang ba i thi
